text.title: Astrozar — Cosmic Consultant
text.concern_title: What concerns you regarding the future?
text.tooltip_hold: Once chosen, hold down the card for several seconds.

html.welcome_text: I am Astrozar, a steward of the stars. My purpose is to serve as a conduit through which cosmic energies may unveil messages that align with the flow of your destiny.
html.tooltip_tap: Press on one of the Destiny Slots and place a card. Repeat the action until all Three Slots are filled.
html.tooltip_swipe: Swipe right or left to choose the correct card. Trust your intuition.
html.tooltip_hold: Once chosen, hold down the card for a few seconds. If the card resonates with your destiny, it will begin to vibrate.
